data.title: Charles Dickens: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Charles Dickens? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Charles Dickens's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Charles Dickens News

MAYBE HAPPY ENDING Starring Darren Criss & Helen J Shen Sets New Dates; Complete Cast Revealed

See the full cast of Maybe Happy Ending on Broadway starring Darren Criss and Helen J Shaw. Learn more and see how to purchase tickets.

Pittsburgh CLO to Present A MUSICAL CHRISTMAS CAROL & More This Holiday Season

Pittsburgh CLO has revealed its 2024 holiday season productions.

Bloomsbury Festival Reveals 2024 Programme

Bloomsbury Festival will return this October with over 100 shows, exhibitions, events, concerts, family activities and walks and talks under the theme ‘Human.Kind’ which will explore AI, global strife, human existence and kindness.

Photos: First look at Worthington Community Theatre's OLIVER!

Worthington Community Theatre would like you to consider yourself at home with Lionel Bart’s classic musical Oliver!, based on the Charles Dickens novel, Oliver Twist. The Tony and Olivier Award-winning show is one of the few musicals to win an Academy Award for Best Picture.

Ensemble Arts And The Philadelphia Orchestra Announces 2024-25 Family Discovery Series

Ensemble Arts and The Philadelphia Orchestra reveal their 2024-25 Family Discovery Series, featuring holiday spectaculars, returning Broadway favorites, and family-friendly orchestra concerts.

SWEENEY TODD, HOW TO SUCCEED & More Set for Penn State Centre Stage 2024-25 Season

Penn State Centre Stage announces its 2024-25 season featuring productions like SWEENEY TODD, HOW TO SUCCEED, LOVE'S LABOUR'S LOST, ALICE IN WONDERLAND, MUCH ADO, and A CHRISTMAS CAROL.

Theatre and Literature: Musical Adaptations of Classic Novels

Which classic books have been made for the stage? Check out the full list here!

The Cleveland Orchestra Adds Three Movies To 2024�"25 Severance Season

The Cleveland Orchestra has added three movies to its 2024–25 Severance season, featuring live performances of scores from classic films. Learn more about the programming and see how to purchase tickets.

Roxy Regional Theatre's Season 42 On Sale This Week

Presale for Season 42 at the Roxy Regional Theatre is happening now for package holders, with ticket sales opening for the general public this Friday, July 12.

Loft Ensemble in North Hollywood Reveals 12th Anniversary Season

Loft Ensemble in North Hollywood has announced its 12th anniversary season. The slate of plays was chosen by the company’s member-elected artistic committee. The season will feature four world premieres, and four of the shows will be presented in Sawyer’s Playhouse, the company’s intimate black box space above the mainstage.

FIDDLER ON THE ROOF, JERSEY BOYS & More Set for Argyle Theatre 2024-25 Season

Long Island's ARGYLE THEATRE has revealed its 2024-25 season featuring a diverse lineup of productions. Learn more about the lineup and see how to purchase tickets.

David Rainey to Return as Ebenezer Scrooge in A CHRISTMAS CAROL at Alley Theatre This Holiday Season

Alley’s holiday tradition, A Christmas Carol, is set to return this season! Learn more and see how to purchase tickets.

Video: Helen J Shen Explains What MAYBE HAPPY ENDING Is All About

In just months, Broadway is getting a new romantic comedy in Maybe Happy Ending, starring Emmy and Golden Globe Award-winner Darren Criss and Helen J Shen. What's the new musical all about? Shen just explained on the red carpet for the 15th Annual Jimmy Awards. Watch in this video!

CHESS IN CONCERT Comes to Mt. Gretna Playhouse in July

Chess the Musical will be brought to life by 17 actors and a 24-piece orchestra in a gorgeous open air venue in Central Pennsylvania.

Pittsburgh Musical Theater Announces WAITRESS, JESUS CHRIST SUPERSTAR And More for 2024-2025 Season

Pittsburgh Musical Theater's 2024-2025 season, 'Heart & Soul,' includes EVIL DEAD THE MUSICAL, DISNEY'S BEAUTY AND THE BEAST, and more, with performances at Byham Theater, Gargaro Theater, and West End Canopy.

A SHERLOCK CAROL Will Return To Marylebone Theatre With Increased Seating Capacity Due To Demand

The worlds of Charles Dickens and Sir Arthur Conan Doyle combine brilliantly in ‘A Sherlock Carol', which sees Sherlock Holmes investigating the mysterious death of Ebenezer Scrooge.

Prime Stage Theatre Announces GREAT EXPECTATIONS, TWELVE ANGRY MEN, And More for 2024-25 Season

Prime Stage Theatre celebrates its 28th season with a mix of classic and contemporary plays embracing themes of strength, voices and hope.

Matthews Playhouse Announces BRIGHT STAR And More for 29th Mainstage Season

Matthews Playhouse of the Performing Arts has announced its 2024-2025 Mainstage Season.

LETTERS LIVE Will Host Special RSPCA Show at The Royal Albert Hall

Letters Live, the literary event which celebrates the power of written correspondence, returns to the Royal Albert Hall on Thursday 12 December in collaboration with the RSPCA for a special one-off event.
